tracks.title: Injection
tracks.description: Marco Bailey seems to be unstoppable and strikes back on his special MBR imprint with another slamming 2-tracker. ''Drizzle'' and ''Injection'' are his new toys that guarantee some flaming action on the dancefloors. Special guest as remixer on duty for this release, is Argentina's finest Flug, offering a brilliant remake on ''Drizzle''. A package that is going definitely going to satisfy even the most demanding clubber.

tracks.title: DEAR GOD
tracks.description:
visuals - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qaWocVOaQsM

oh god , look at me well.
look at the things you made me feel.
did it make you happy?
that it made me ill.

oh god, look what you did.
look at the things that made me sin.
did it make you happy?
that it made me ill.

oh god, look what i felt.
everything i know was all in hell.
did it make you happy?

oh god look at this life.
every lil thing that past me by.
did it make you happy?

look at the window.
look at the rain.
look at the things around me,
yet you gave me pain.

look at the window.
look at my face.
looked at the things you did,
yet im stuck in this place.
oh god , look at me well.

look at the things you made me feel.
did it make you happy?
that it made me ill.

PROD https://soundcloud.com/gentle-beatz

tracks.title: All I Want
tracks.description:
www.facebook.com/dawngoldenmusic
www.twitter.com/dawngoldenmusic
http://www.dawngolden.tumblr.com

Watch the video here: http://smarturl.it/AllIWantVideo

Purchase Still Life on iTunes: http://bit.ly/1dU9qBC

Album Artwork by SamÃ¼el Johnson

Lyrics:

Your eyes, they did flutter again
And your mouth it did hang wide
When you told me 'every little thing is going to be alright'

But we were younger then,
And now we're not
And if there was a plan made 
Then we forgot about it 
And if there was time
I could figure it out now

But life is short
And I don't care for most of it. 


Because you're all that I want.


Well I know I'm hard to take
And my bones are calling out your name.
While I beat your cold windows
Break the locks on the gate
While I try to forget 
I used to be something great. 

Because you're all that I want.
